page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT-THE DONUTS
page.content: The Donuts are a local band which formed in 1984.The Donuts usually play twice a week in pubs or clubs.They play music that you can dance to,there are seven people in the group.There is a drummer,there is also a lead singer,two guitarists,a keyboard player,a saxophone player,a bongo player & a soundman.The Donuts are hoping to bring out a record & a video.The lead singer & the drummer started The Donuts by playing in pubs. They play other people's songs and they play their own compositions.Now they make up their own dances.They got the idea of starting the group & the dark glasses from the film "The Blues Brothers".They wear black suits & dark glasses.They call their concerts "Gigs".
